main: ^I heard what you did today in the town, helping others.
^You really did make everyone happy, but why are you so sad?
^I am sad because I don't have a gift for you...
^Why would you need a gift for me?
^Because I was going to confess to you today.
^I really like you and I wanted to give you something special.
^Oh...But you don't need to get me something beacuse seeing you today helping and making everyone happy it's a good enough pressent for me.
^And...I really like you too...Because you bring the world around you with your kindness.
^Then I must be like the world because you attract me as well.
^Hehe. You are funny. You wanna go for a walk?
